name: Shoot 'Em Up Destruction Set 3
overview: Alf Yngve blasts back onto the C64 with the SHOOT EM UP DESTRUCTION SET 3, the biggest and best SEUDS compilation so far, this time featuring SIX full games in total! Alf has once again teamed up with Richard Bayliss and Carl Mason for this release and Richard has delivered excellent front-ends, in-game enhancements along with a splendid array of soundtracks for each game. Carl 'Mase' Mason has handled the loading bitmaps for each game and has done some excellent pixel-work for each game that include some fantastic 'Ocean / Imagine' homages. We are also very pleased to announce that the inlay artwork for SEUDS 3 features a stunning action-packed design by renowned industry artist Oliver Frey! Power up your C64, plug in a joystick and prepare to unleash destruction in the third exciting SHOOT 'EM UP DESTRUCTION SET for the Commodore 64! SEUDS 3 features SIX fully enhanced shoot 'em ups for the Commodore 64 ... Power-up your ship and do battle in the retro-styled vertically scrolling shoot 'em up ZAP FIGHT, defeat enemy forces in the sideways scrolling Green Beret/Rush'n Attack inspired BLUE BERET, smash the confederate militia with your cybernetic fists in BARAKON, hunt enemy spies in the dual-controlled SPY RIDER, do battle on land and sea in OPERATION FIRESTORM and continue the fight with the insectoid empire in the punishing SUPER TAU ZERO 2!
